outline:
1. to diminish, restrain, withdraw, abate, keep back, do away, take from, clip
    1. (Qal)
      1. to diminish
      2. to restrain
      3. to withdraw
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be withdrawn
      2. to be restrained
    3. (Piel) to withdraw, draw up
kjv_def: abate, clip, (di-) minish, do (take) away, keep back, restrain, make small, withdraw.
strongs_def: to scrape off; by implication, to shave, remove, lessen, withhold
